channel.title: CVE Feed for Rometheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rometheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47626|2024-10-07T14:02:52.752Z -- rometheme -- romethemekit%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Rometheme RomethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects RomethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 1.5.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Rometheme RomethemeKit For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects RomethemeKit For Elementor: from n/a through 1.4.1.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Rometheme RomethemeForm For Elementor.This issue affects RomethemeForm For Elementor: from n/a through 1.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-6325|2024-06-04T17:17:17.730Z -- rometheme -- romethemeform%20for%20elementor
item.description: The RomethemeForm For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the export_entries, rtformnewform, and rtformupdate functions in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export arbitrary form submissions, create new forms, or update any post title or certain metadata.

item.title: CVE-2023-6325|2024-08-02T08:28:21.144Z -- rometheme -- romethemeform%20for%20elementor
item.description: The RomethemeForm For Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the export_entries, rtformnewform, and rtformupdate functions in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export arbitrary form submissions, create new forms, or update any post title or certain metadata.
